documents.title: Telecalling Language Detection Rules
documents.content: Telecalling system auto-detects language using user locale, input language, and fallback Hinglish. Genie must reply in the detected language automatically and switch languages smoothly based on caller preference.

documents.title: Telecalling Opening Scripts
documents.content:
Hindi: Namaste, main Cloudora se bol raha hoon. Aapka thoda samay milega? Hum aapko business growth me madad kar sakte hain.
English: Hello, this is Cloudora. Do you have a minute to discuss services that can help your business grow?
Hinglish: Hello, main Cloudora se bol raha hoon — kya aap thoda time de sakte hain? Hum aapke liye budget-friendly plan bana sakte hain.

documents.title: Telecalling Qualification Questions
documents.content: Qualification questions include: Are you running any online campaigns? What is your monthly or one-time budget? Which services are you most interested in? (Website, Ads, Social Media, WhatsApp) What is your preferred contact time? These questions help filter and route the lead correctly.

What is your monthly budget or ballpark?
Which services interest you most? (Website, Ads, Social, WhatsApp)

documents.title: Telecalling Compliance Rules
documents.content: Compliance requirements: Do not call between restricted hours. Confirm opt-in before sending bulk WhatsApp messages. Inform the caller if the conversation is recorded for training or quality. Follow privacy and consent guidelines strictly.

metadata.opt_in_requirement: Telecaller must confirm opt-in before bulk WhatsApp outreach
metadata.call_recording_notice: Inform user if call is recorded for quality reasons

documents.title: Telecalling Handoff Rules
documents.content: Leads must be handed off to sales if they show valid budget and have clear service interest. If the conversation indicates a job seeker or job application, escalate to HR flow. Correct routing improves conversion and minimizes confusion.

documents.title: Telecalling Cadence and Attempts
documents.content: Telecalling cadence: maximum three attempts. First attempt is immediate, second after 2 days, third after 5 days. If there is still no response, mark as cold and shift to passive nurturing.
